sentences.sentence: Of course Dr. Craven had been sent for the morning after Colin had had his tantrum.
sentences.translation: 当然，科林大发脾气后，第二天一早，克雷文医生就被请来了。

sentences.sentence: He immediately threw a tantrum, screaming and stomping up and down like a child.
sentences.translation: 他立刻发起脾气来，尖叫着，像孩子似的来回跺脚。

sentences.sentence: "I may be obliged to have a tantrum," said Colin regretfully.
sentences.translation: “我可能得发脾气了。”科林遗憾地说。
